title: Nike splits with Kyrie Irving, cancels shoe release amid antisemitism fallout: ‘There is no place for hate speech’
dc:creator: Catherine Larkin, Kim Bhasin, Bloomberg
description: Nike has had enough of NBA star Kyrie Irving, who has refused to disavow antisemitism.
content:encoded: Nike has had enough of NBA star Kyrie Irving, who has refused to disavow antisemitism. Read More
